column14: Nice book. I have been traveling a lot, so I listened to the audio of this book. I really enjoyed it.

column8: Concrete Mathematics: A Foundation for Computer Science, by Ronald Graham, Donald Knuth, and Oren Patashnik, is a textbook that is widely used in computer-science departments
